aka: Melchior the Apothecary: The Executioner's Daughter

director.name: 埃尔莫·纽加农 Elmo Nüganen

trans_title: Melchior the Apothecary: The Executioner's Daughter
introduction: Melchior’s bride Keterlyn happens to witness an attack on a young man. He has lost his memory and doesn’t know who he is or where’s he from. The only clue is a strange partial letter found on him that warns of grave danger. Melchior’s attempts to understand the circumstances of the young man’s memory loss lead him to uncover a hidden dead body. The partial letter gives Melchior an idea how to lure the killer into a trap... but this time the danger comes too close to home.
